◆ FromParquetSchema() [1/4]

PARQUET_EXPORT ::arrow::Status parquet::arrow::FromParquetSchema ( const SchemaDescriptor *  parquet_schema,
const std::vector< int > &  column_indices,
const std::shared_ptr< const KeyValueMetadata > &  key_value_metadata,
std::shared_ptr<::arrow::Schema > *  out 
)

Convert parquet schema to arrow schema with selected indices.

Parameters
parquet_schemato be converted
column_indicesindices of leaf nodes in parquet schema tree. Appearing ordering matters for the converted schema. Repeated indices are ignored except for the first one
key_value_metadataoptional metadata, can be nullptr
outthe corresponding arrow schema
Returns
Status::OK() on a successful conversion.

const std::shared_ptr< WriterProperties > &  properties = default_writer_properties(),

)

Write a Table to Parquet.

The table shall only consist of columns of primitive type or of primitive lists.
